name: Frndzk Post From Any Mobile
author: Bitto Kazi

sections.description:
Frndzk Post From Any Mobile Plugin enables you to add post to your blog from any mobile browser. no setup or configuration needed. Just install and you will be able to post from mobile. Plugin Page Link Will be at footer of your admin panel to get easy access. demo plugin developed by bitto kazi

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘frndzk-post-from-any-mobile.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory and extract the zip file
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

for questions please write here
